name: REBEL DUCK: FIGHTERS
description:
That. That was the mistake that destroy our dream of get rated in GMTK(my first year entry at this jam ) one blocker that prevents player input with mouse in once image ONLY one. but  it was to late for update our submission.
here is the game jam playable version. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Select your Duck, train it and build your Ultimate Bird Fighter in this turn-ish based rpg.

Your duck has a personality of its own, in combat you tell it what to do, but does it trust you enough to listen?

Made in 48 hours for Game Makers Toolkit Game Jam 2020.

Programming by:

  • HedersonLeeh
  • CelisMX

Art and Design:

  • Kichex
  • Nagameco

Music by:

  • Aelsgeon
